   rain on you hoes.

2468.10.text: So, thank you, I appreciate it.

2470.00.text: - You are the worst winner ever!

2472.00.text:
- I really am, so hopefully
  you'll have me back

2473.54.text: so you can beat me sometime.

2475.31.text: - Oh, you can count on that!

2477.94.text:
- Thanks for watching,
 play more games!

2479.68.text:
And we'll see you next
 time, on TableTop.
